definition: lacking funds, an occasion for excessive eating or drinking, to break open or apart suddenly and forcefully
details:
adjective
- lacking funds
= example: lacking funds
= synonyms: broke
noun
- an occasion for excessive eating or drinking
= example: an occasion for excessive eating or drinking
= synonyms: tear
- a sculpture of the head and shoulders of a person
= example: a sculpture of the head and shoulders of a person
- the chest of a woman
= example: the chest of a woman
= synonyms: female chest
- a complete failure
= example: a complete failure
= synonyms: flop
verb
- to break open or apart suddenly and forcefully
= example: to break open or apart suddenly and forcefully
= synonyms: burst
- to go to pieces
= example: to go to pieces
= synonyms: break
- to ruin completely
= example: to ruin completely
= synonyms: break
- to search without warning, make a sudden surprise attack on
= example: to search without warning, make a sudden surprise attack on
= synonyms: raid
